mapper.select: select type, status, start_time, end_time, editor, server_id as serverId from fulltextindex_rebuild_audit
mapper.insert: insert into fulltextindex_rebuild_audit (type, status, start_time, editor, server_id) values (#{type}, #{status}, now(3), #{editor}, #{serverId}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `start_time` = now(3), `end_time` = null, `server_id` = #{serverId}, `editor` = #{editor}, `error` = null
